messages.subject: Re: labels (were we talking about canned goods?)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Since many of the recent posts have been somewhat less than unschooling-focused, I m happy to agree with moving on. However, Linda, could you please quote
messages.messageBody:
2/17/03 22:16:

> lets just forget it an move on.
>
> Linda

Since many of the recent posts have been somewhat less than
unschooling-focused, I'm happy to agree with moving on.

However, Linda, could you please quote a small portion of the post to which
you are replying so that silly little me reading zillions of messages out
here in digest-land knows what the heck you're refering to?

Thanks, I would really appreciate that.

brenda

p.s. The subject line got that old song stuck in my brain again...

Labels are good for canned goods,
so you don't mistake the spinach for the beans
but the people that your meetin'
aren't the same as food you're eatin'
don't put labels on my friends.
